channel.title: Lil questions..help
channel.description:
hey i got these important questions :/
1-how i change monsters drops rate and itmes? 2-how i make my server online? [that is the important thing!][i've done the firewall and port forward] anything i miss it? 3-how can i change the d claws spec and hits? [when i spec it like dds spec] rolf.. 4-if i add npc or object how i remove them? 5- i got this 1 error with compile..how i fix it? [client.java:14958: class, interface, or enum expected { ^ ]
ty.. fallen angel

item.title: Lil questions..help
item.dc:creator: @pk_george1 pk george1
item.description:
@pk_george1 wrote:

  1. Npcdrops.
  2. Get the no-ip.com if not there is a big tutorial on it in the server tutorials section.
  3. Change the special on it by searching for the item id and you will come to it, Change the animation and gfx and also edit the power.
    4.Npc = autospawm, object = deletethatobject in the client.java.
  4. It may be to far away from the last piece of code, maybe move it back 1 space, im not sure on this one.

Hope i helped

Read full topic
